title.narrative: Enhancing Psychosocial Support and Economic Empowerment of Women and Girls Survivors of Violence in Oromia Regional State

description.narrative: Increased number of women and girls survivors ofviolence empowered, rehabilitated and self-sufficient.

title.narrative: Number of survivors who are Psychologically and physically rehabilitated and number of survivors integrated into the society

description.narrative: The shelter improved access to holistic services including safe shelter, food, psychosocial counselling, legal assistance and medical support for 700 beneficiaries (479 survivors and their 221 children).
